headline_galleries: Taking Action to Reduce Pollution and Protect Our Local Ecosystem.
headline_galleries_text: Discover the efforts of our community as we join hands to clean our environment. From riverbanks to narrow alleys, these moments reflect our dedication to creating a cleaner and healthier environment for everyone.
